name: Darting Viper
text: When using a dorn-dergar, you can quickly attack both near and distant foes.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +4, proficiency with the dwarven dorn-dergar.
benefit: You can change whether youâ€™re using the dorndergar as a normal or reach weapon as a swift action.
normal: Changing whether a dorn-dergar is a normal or reach weapon is a move action.
